page.title: 06AQUEDUCT - A NEW ESTATE.
page.content: We moved onto the estate when it was first built in 1981.There were lots of difficulties.There was not a bus service.There were no dentists,doctors or even a shop.The main shopping centre is about 3 miles away.In 1984 the bus service opened in Aqueduct. This goes through Majestic Way one bus every hour.There is a small general store on the estate now.A community centre has been built next to the school where various local groups such as the play group and mums and toddlers meet.There is still over a mile to go to get to the doctors or the dentists but a mobile clinic visits the community center each week. We have asked four children who have moved to Aqueduct what they like best about the estate. They said either the big park or the old pit mounds that are behind the school.
